mapper.select:
/*clubMapper.selectMeetingList*/ select mt.meeting_no , mt.title , mt.club_no , (select nick_nm from member m where m.member_no = mt.host_no) as host_nm , (select ccd.code_dtl_nm from cmmn_code_dtl ccd where ccd.code_dtl_id = mt.meeting_gbn) as meeting_gbn , date_format(mt.dday, '%Y-%m-%d') as dday , concat(substr(mt.time,1,2),':',substr(mt.time,3,4)) as time , mt.place , concat((select count(*) from meeting_member mm where mm.meeting_no = mt.meeting_no), '/', mt.attend_cnt) as attend_cnt , date_format(mt.frst_reg_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%S') as frst_reg_dt from meeting mt
order by mt.dday desc, mt.time desc
mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and mt.club_no = #{clubNo}
and mt.meeting_gbn = #{srchGbn}
and mt.title like concat('%',#{srchText},'%')
and mt.nick_nm like concat('%',#{srchText},'%')
and mt.place like concat("%",#{srchText},'%')
and mt.dday between replace(#{srchStartDt},'-','') and replace(#{srchEndDt},'-','')
